comments:
Build 20031105

I get the following when I try to import binary plug-ins. I don't have a test 
case, but it seems clear that there's a problem with my workspace. Hopefully, 
the stack trace will be enough to spot where the null is coming from.

This one is pretty puzzling.
What seems to be returning null is a call to ResourcesPlugin.getWorkspace
().getRoot().
This should never return null.  On the East coast anyways :-)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 46444 ***
